name: Licensed & Insured
description: Peach State Electric is fully licensed in Georgia and carries $2 million in liability insurance, ensuring complete peace of mind for our residential customers.

name: EV Charger Specialists
description: Our team has installed over 300 Level 2 EV chargers across Atlanta homes and is certified by Tesla and ChargePoint.

name: 5-Star Reputation
description: With over 400 five-star reviews on Google and Yelp, Peach State Electric is one of the highest-rated electrical contractors in the Atlanta metro area.

name: Same-Day Service
description: We offer same-day service for most electrical repairs in Buckhead, Decatur, and Midtown when you call before noon.

name: Code Compliance Experts
description: Our electricians stay up-to-date with the latest Atlanta building codes, ensuring all our work passes inspection the first time.

name: Smart Home Integration
description: We specialize in smart switches, dimmers, and home automation systems compatible with Alexa, Google Home, and Apple HomeKit.

name: Emergency Response
description: Our 24/7 emergency response team can be dispatched within 60 minutes anywhere in Fulton and DeKalb counties.

name: Transparent Pricing
description: Every job begins with a clear, upfront quote. No hidden fees. No surprises. Just honest pricing you can trust.

name: Trusted by Realtors
description: Top Atlanta real estate agents recommend us for pre-listing electrical inspections and quick turnaround repairs.

name: Locally Owned
description: Peach State Electric is proudly locally owned and operated â€” no franchises, just real electricians who live and work in your community.
